Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $13,500. This is a unique opportunity to acquire a high-quality item at a competitive rate. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $13,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $13,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
